title: Cane Creek adds limited edition Oil Slick chainring spiders for eeWings titanium cranks
content:
Oil slick all the things? That seems to be the case if you’ve been paying attention to new releases lately. Or for the past few years for that matter. The multi-hued “oil slick” look has become a popular addition to the typical anodized parts in solitary colors. Adding the colorful option to their chainrings for […]

The post Cane Creek adds limited edition Oil Slick chainring spiders for eeWings titanium cranks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
